file_content.text: Rana Squadron will fly again.
The old Reclamation base data is wiped clean.
Master Jedi, I don't know what to say.
Another victory for Havoc Squad.
I'm glad we can count you as an ally.
Then the mission's a success.
Major Dejan will be pleased, not to mention the Reconstruction Authority. But no one will be as grateful as me.
Consider yourself an honorary member of Rana Squadron. You've more than earned it. And once I'm back at base, I'll let the men's families know their last mission is complete.
Consider yourselves honorary members of Rana Squadron. You've more than earned it. And once I'm back at base, I'll let the men's families know their last mission is complete.
We've already lost too many lives trying to erase our data. Don't add to that number.
Rana Squadron's down, sir.
Rana Squadron's down. Every last one.
I caught some flak, bailed out. Got a few durasteel splinters in my hide, but nothing that will keep me from making it back.
But my wingmen, all proud Duros, ace pilots... they didn't make it. Shot down by those blasted pirates!
Were you on a mission?
Give me the full report.
What was your mission?
Ouch.
That's putting it mildly, but thank you.
A grave loss, Captain.
I appreciate that. Thank you.
Taris has claimed many lives.
I know, but that's not the point.
Rana Squadron was sent to obliterate the old Taris Reclamation base. Previous occupants were killed by rakghouls and toxins, but their data's still intact.
Our bombs were supposed to incinerate the intel, but the pirate scum beat us there, killed my squadron... my Duros brothers!
Finish your mission, and you'll honor your squadron's sacrifice.
They won't die for nothing.
I'll never take down an entire enemy force, especially while I'm injured.
Revenge won't justify your squadron's death.
Control your anger.
Yes, Master Jedi. But finishing the mission will.
The Republic intel's compromised. We can't let the pirates sell it off.
Then your mission stands.
Correct, sir. If those records get out, the Empire could ruin our entire reconstruction plan.
But if anyone can stop them, it's Havoc Squad.
But if anyone can stop them, it's your team.
The scavenger scum won't get away with this!
Time for payback.
If only I were in fighting shape....
Want me to erase the data?
I was hoping you'd say that.
Poor, pathetic you.
I'm not here to feel sorry for myself.
Swallow that anger.
I'm... you're right. The mission comes first.
The pirates will sell our entire Reclamation strategy to the highest bidder, crippling our reconstruction, unless you stop them first.
I'll disappear your intel.
Consider our intel destroyed.
Rana Squadron thanks you.
Watch and learn, Captain.
Can't wait for the show.
Recover our datalogs, force your way into the central command station and destroy our control droid. Brute force and thoroughness encouraged.
After that, the pirate scum won't find a scrap of intel worth selling.
Sorry. [Refuse quest]
I'll be sure and tell that to Major Dejan... and Rana Squadron.
One minute we were checking our flight systems, the next....
